rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing right_command + right_shift at the same time

manipulators.description: Change left control to Hyper Key (command+control+option)

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
